sentences.english: Building a concrete Koi pond is a very expensive thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個具體的錦鯉池是一個非常昂貴的事情。

sentences.english: What impressed me most were the Jin Carp with colorful appearance there.
sentences.chinese: 給我們印象很深的是那裏的錦鯉，色彩很豔麗。

sentences.english: Amazingly, when placed in a lake, koi can grow to three feet long.
sentences.chinese: 令人驚訝的是，當放養在湖泊裏，錦鯉能長到三尺長。

sentences.english: Our children always enjoy feeding the koi fish at the park pool.
sentences.chinese: 我們的孩子一向喜歡去公園魚池喂錦鯉。

sentences.english: Regularly use of AOKO KOI can effectively prevent algae growth.
sentences.chinese: 只需準時添加錦鯉青子，便能有用地防備藻類滋長。

sentences.english: In order to prevent your Koi from becoming ill you'll need to take some precautions.
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止您的錦鯉從得病你需要採取一些預防措施。

sentences.english: To all our customers and koi lovers.
sentences.chinese: 甲洞錦鯉的所有顧客和愛好者。

sentences.english: Red fish in a koi pond in Suzhou, China(This photo and caption were submitted to My Shot.)
sentences.chinese: 中國蘇州錦鯉池裏的金魚。

sentences.english: Koi carps swim in a pond of a breeding farm near Gent in Belgium on Aug. 17.
sentences.chinese: 錦鯉八月十七日於比利時根特附近的池塘裏悠遊。

sentences.english: Koi Pond in the Side Yard.
Koi breeding industry in China is just at its beginning.
sentences.chinese: 錦鯉養殖業在中國的發展僅僅是開始。

definition: Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color/fig. a profusion of flourishing trades
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
